words.hint: A storage location paired with a name that contains data
A reusable block of code designed to perform a single action
A sequence of instructions that repeats until a condition is met
A collection of elements identified by index or key
A sequence of characters often used to represent text
A whole number without a fractional part
A data type that has only two possible values: true or false
A collection of key-value pairs

To run a program or a set of instructions
An error that occurs during the execution of a program
A symbol that tells the compiler or interpreter to perform a specific mathematical, relational, or logical operation

A collection of modules that provide useful functionalities
